message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this unique item to you at a special price of $950000. This is an exceptional deal considering the true worth of the product surpasses $1200000. I believe it presents a fantastic chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a fraction of its market value. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product.
